price: 9. où ils séjourneront pour l’éternité. Telle est véritablement la promesse d’Allah, et c’est Lui le Tout-Puissant, le Sage.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
